text:
Dear Jerry: /
Many thanks for your kind follow-up note
and for the welcome/"CARE" packages.
MThe Hid/den Medium" is an eye-opener, an
ear-opener and a ^ieart-opener. Let's hope it leads
to all the good things NER envisions.
That Was a delightful luncheon. My
appreciation, j
Roger Penn has sent me helpful materials
on WAMU-PM, and we will be having lunch after he
gets back from the NAB Convention.
I saw Nick Zapple last night at the White
House Photographer's Dinner and reiterated the Vice
President',s interest.
It is a special pleasure to know that NER
is in such good hands.
I'll be looking forward to our further
fruitful contact.
Sincerely,
Assistant to the
Vice President
Mr. Jerrola Sandler
National Educational Radio
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N. W.
Washington, D. C. 20036
